thread.title: Ground News - Sunny weekend on horizon for Casper
thread.title_full: Ground News - Sunny weekend on horizon for Casper

author: Oil City News
title: Ground News - Sunny weekend on horizon for Casper
text:
Summary by Oil City News CASPER , Wyo. — Casper area residents will be able to close the book on 2023 in style, as the National Weather Service predicts good weather for the final weekend of the year. According to the NWS, today will likely be sunny, with a high temperature near 43 degrees expected. Conditions throughout the day should be breezy, with southwest winds moving through the region at 11-17 mph. Wind gusts as strong as 26 mph may be possible in the afternoon. … Share menu More
